Correction procedure: Linear regression models for segmental context effects defined for each native language and cue name. Obtains sum of model terms (estimated coefficient * factor)  applied as an offset when computing residual cue values in both Step 1 and 2.
Purpose: Corrects cues for segmental context effects such as the presence of nasals and rhotics.

Correction procedure: Linear regression model for suprasegmental context effects defined for each Native Language. Obtains sum of model terms (estimated coefficient * factor) applied as an offset when computing residual cue values.
Purpose: Corrects for effects of word length and stress
